sentences.english: Joe Cole on the new owner reveals his adulation.
sentences.chinese: 喬科爾對新東家流露出崇拜之情。

sentences.english: Messrs. Buffett and Sokol have some things in common.
sentences.chinese: 巴菲特和索科爾存在一些共同點。

sentences.english: Cole has reason to suppose his luck has turned.
sentences.chinese: 喬科爾有理由相信他的好運將會來臨。

sentences.english: His death was announced by the University of Utah in Salt Lake City, where Dr.
sentences.chinese: 鹽湖城猶他大學宣佈了科爾夫博士去世的消息。

sentences.english: Accordingly Fakeer appointed Colman very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 因此法科爾很快任命了科爾曼。

sentences.english: Accordingly Fakeer appointed Colman very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 因此法科爾很快任命了科爾曼。

sentences.english: Australians generally believe that Corby is innocent and the punishment is too severe.
sentences.chinese: 澳洲人普遍認爲科爾比是無辜，而且刑罰過重。

sentences.english: Jason died a poor death in the kingdom of Colchis.
sentences.chinese: 傑森悲慘地死在科爾切斯王國。

sentences.english: This is part of James S. Coleman’s Foundations of Social Theory.
sentences.chinese: 這是詹姆士科爾曼的社會基礎理論的一部分。

sentences.english: The report paints a picture of Buffett as having been duped by Sokol.
sentences.chinese: 該報告給人一種巴菲特被索科爾欺騙的印象。

sentences.english: Homer and Langley Collyer were found dead in their home in nineteen forty-seven.
sentences.chinese: 荷馬和蘭利科爾耶發現它們在一九四七年死於家。

sentences.english: He talked one of Nichole's friends into going with him.
sentences.chinese: 他說服尼科爾的一位朋友陪他去。

sentences.english: The northern part of Liaoning Province lies to the south of Kerqin Desert of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧北部處於內蒙古科爾沁沙地“百里翰海”的南緣。

sentences.english: China travel, Inner Mongolia, Horqin, Xianghai wetland, drought. Photo by KaKa.
sentences.chinese: 中國旅遊，內蒙古，科爾沁，向海溼地，乾旱。

sentences.english: Joe Cole was one of the few who got out in time.
sentences.chinese: 喬科爾是及少數及時逃出房產泡沫的投資人之一。

sentences.english: Colby went up to his CO to ask for orders.
sentences.chinese: 科爾比站出來找到連長，請求他下命令。
